pageContext.claim: “The Republicans have now won 8 out of 9 House Seats, yet if you listen to the Fake News Media you would think we are being clobbered. Why can’t they play it straight, so unfair to the Republican Party and in particular, your favorite President!”
pageContext.analysis: Republicans have narrowly won races in strongly Republicans districts that they should have easily won, which is why analysts say Republicans are in danger of losing control of the House of Representatives. The Cook Political report estimated that the Democrats outperformed by an average of eight percentage points -- which would signal the Democratic takeover. Moreover, Republicans have won 8 out of 10 special elections.
